title: Screen is not working properly it does not wake up but sometimes coloured lines apear (unlockings so
content:
Screen is not working properly it does not wake up but sometimes coloured lines appear (unlocking sounds are audible). Battery used to run out very quickly form 100% to 0 within an hours use.

I bought the unlocked Pixel from the US but I now live in Qatar (Are there any certified service centers here?).

I have previously had to ship the phone back to the US as the motherboard had issues and it was replaced for free (even though I did not have warranty) .
